Row.Text: Quadrireme and Machine Gun [ICON_Range] Range +1.[NEWLINE]Builds Encampment district in half the time.[NEWLINE]The support unit can obtain 1 unit free of charge when acquiring the technology necessary for production.

All unit gains +5 [ICON_Strength] Strength when defending.[NEWLINE]All naval units (without aiircraft carrier) can pillage buildings and improvements and capture civilian units on coastal lands.[NEWLINE]All units gain ocean navigation capability as they can get on board.

A district unique to Abyssal Fleets for naval activity in your city. Replaces the Harbor district. This District have hitpoints. [NEWLINE]Increase of [ICON_Traderoute] trade route unconditionally during construction of coastal fort.[NEWLINE]The other abilities are the same as Royal Navy Dockyard.
Abyssal Fleets unique district: Coastal Fort
Unlocks the Builder ability to construct a Drillship, unique to Abyssal Fleets.[NEWLINE][NEWLINE]+1 [ICON_Gold] Gold, +2 [ICON_Production] Production. Can be built on Coasts and Oceans.
Harbour Princess unique unit that replaces the Ironcrad. Stronger than the Ironcrad. +5 [ICON_GreatAdmiral] Great Admiral points for killing units.
Harbour Princess unique unit: Abyssal Armored Cruiser
I told you... not to come... any... closer...
